column5: Later to night when i get back from a job site that i need to get my butt to right now , i'd like to write a short story on how i found my like this year for the water , boats and fishing then post it to this thread and see how it compares with others on here . Come back later , bye for now ..............Ron .
Always enjoy those kinda stories Skipper, I'll be watching for it.

So, where's the story?  I was born and raised a fisherman. most of my family were commercial fisherman until the collapse of the fishery. Its just in my blood I guess. I'm drawn to water, anywhere I go.  S,

Sorry every one , just got home from work minutes a go , and sitting down now for supper , looks like if i don't get the story on here by tomorrow night i;ll get it done in the wee hours of saturday morning  , sorry , man its been a long day  am wipped
You're drawn to water or is waterfowl drawn to you...
LOL ...How bad could a story about boats and fishing be ? Any ways i better get to work and heres hopeing for a good weather fishing week end for every one .
I once knew a fisherman named Ron ...
Hey my board name is Ron, my real name is Ron, could it be that I was the Ron you knew?
I   guess you'll have to wait til i get the story wrote to find out Ron ....................... Ron ..lol .
